game.name: Zombie Survival
game.description:
Not everyone dares to survive amidst a horde of bloodthirsty zombies. However, you are a brave soul who has decided to enter an environment surrounded by a large number of dangerous souls. It looks a pretty challenging task. But, you have the ability to make it easier with your ultimate skill of shooting. Join Zombie Survival game and show the world that you are a real survivor on this planet! Be alert all the time as all have transformed into monsters due to a terrible virus!
Your objective in this cool action game is to escape the dead coming at you and kill all zombies on your way. Choose from different types of weapons and shoot four types of deadly zombies through your gun! No one is seen except you in this world. So, you have to take care of this challenging job on your own. Play game online wisely to save your planet as the last survivor on your group! Run as fast as you can to cover the long distance! Make a proper distance from the moving corpses!
Aim your weapon at the moving evils to maximize their damage output in this isometric zombie shooter game! You will have three different game modes to explore and enjoy the blocky graphics. Do not forget to collect the coins dropped by many zombies on the way! Use those coins to upgrade your weapons and buy new guns. Try out a rampage mode where you will be allowed to make your shooting skill faster! Have fun in our more html5 zombie games for free!
game.metaTitle: Zombie Survival, Shooting Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Zombie Survival at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Shooting games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.webControlKeys: A,D -MOVWW L-R, LEFT CLICK TO SHOOT
